short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows saving and loading of form data within the bexio time tracking page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension improves handling of time tracking in bexio. How? It enables the user to save the form data as templates. The templates are placed as buttons directly on the time tracking page. So with one click the form will fill out all the values you saved earlier.

Sidebar
These templates are also available in the panel within the browsers sidebar.
In the sidebar panel you can manage the templates (edit/delete) as well as reach out to further features:

ManicTime (https://www.manictime.com)
You can also import entries from ManicTime and use features like, Time, Date, Billable, Notes etc. to directly apply Time entries, including selecting a template for all the other values.

Data is yours only
All the data is saved in your browsers storage, they are not accessible from outside nor are they sent outside of your browser.

FULL FEATURE OVERVIEW & FEATURE REQUESTS & ISSUE REPORT: https://github.com/SoulcodeAgency/bexio-chrome-extension

CHANGELOG: https://github.com/SoulcodeAgency/bexio-chrome-extension/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md
